# First, why Posit? {.smaller}

:::{.incremental}
**Code-first research and data science**

- **Value** - R and Python are free
- **Portable** - no vendor lock-in, you can look under the hood and take your code with you
- **Reproducible** - run code anywhere anytime
- **Secure** - code can be inspected because it is open, our enterprise tools use your authentication provider
- **Scalable** - use our tools in local or remote clusters like Kubernetes or Slurm
- **Customizable** - when your analyses and products start with code, you build what you want
- **First** - with R and Python you can use the latest functions and algorithms
- **Beautiful** - R and Python incorporate beautiful JavaScript visualization libraries

:::

## This is all doable

## Even if some of it is hard  

## We can help you

# The philosophy

- Code-first 
- Use code to do analysis and build things 

# The mental model

- Building and racing cars

:::{.incremental}

- R and Python are publicly available tools - use them to build and share whatever you want
- Workbench is your main garage where you use the tools to build and test cars
- Connect is the racetrack where you use and present you cars
- Package Manager is the tool distribution hub that ensures consistent tools in all places

:::
